tool_description: Recommends appropriate lumber grades based on wood species, project visibility, and structural requirements to optimize cost and quality.

project_visibility.description: How visible the lumber will be (hidden, semi_visible, fully_visible, featured)

budget_priority.description: Budget vs quality priority (economy, balanced, premium)

error_messages: Unknown wood species: Species not recognized in grading database
Invalid visibility level: Use one of [hidden, semi_visible, fully_visible, featured]
Invalid structural load: Use one of [none, light, moderate, heavy]
Invalid defect tolerance: Use one of [low, medium, high]
Invalid budget priority: Use one of [economy, balanced, premium]
usage: Specify wood species, how visible it will be in the final project, and structural requirements. Adjust defect tolerance and budget priority as needed.

grade_descriptions.description: Descriptions of what each grade includes

relative_pricing.description: Relative cost indicators for each grade option
